pageSubtitle: Manage security policies including password requirements, lockout rules, and abnormal login detection.
historyCountHelp: Number of previous passwords to remember and prevent reuse.
expirationDaysHelp: Number of days before a password expires (0 for never).
minAgeDaysHelp: Minimum days a user must keep a password before changing it.
maxFailedAttemptsHelp: Number of failed attempts before lockout.
abnormalLoginHistoryCountHelp: Number of recent logins to analyze for abnormalities.
blockAbnormalLoginHelp: Automatically block logins detected as abnormal.
registrationEnabledHelp: When disabled, new users cannot register accounts.
